name: RXC - Rally Cross Challenge (Arcade Cabinet Build)
name_original: RXC - Rally Cross Challenge (Arcade Cabinet Build)
description:
This isn't just another top-down arcade racing game. RXC is a physics heavy racing game with a traction and handling model that challenges even die-hard sim racers while still being fun for newcomers.

This is an early build of the game meant for our full size arcade cabinet. We're releasing it here as a fun sneak peak, not as a representation of the final quality of the game.

 
This build requires a gamepad!

Throttle - Right Trigger

Brake - Left Trigger

Steering - Left Stick

Reset To Track - Right Shoulder
